attributes.action: STOP BANKS TAKING OUR BENEFITS FOR THERE SO CALLED CHARGES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE BANKS & BUILDING SOCIATIES ARE TAKING THERE  UNLAWFUL CHARGES OUT OF OUR MONEY WE ARE ALLOWED TO LIVE ON , FAMILIES ARE GIVEN THESE BENEFITS TO LIVE ON NOT FOR BANKS TO HELP THEMSELVES TO THESE  CHARGES THE GOVENMENT SETS A CERTAIN AMOUNT FOR US TO LIVE ON HOW CAN WE WHEN THSE CHARGES ARE TAKEN OUT  BY THE BANKS FOR THERE CHARGES  LETS GET THIS GOING  THANKYOU FOR SIGNING

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
